item.title: Democrats Hate Anyone Who Doesn’t Love Crime And Fraud As Much As They Do — Even Leftists
item.description: The first rule of Democrat Club is that you aren't supposed to mention the fraud and the grift.

item.title: Mitch McConnell Might Try To Smother The SAVE Act To Spite Trump
item.description: 'I just sent a letter to Mitch McConnell asking his committee to stop stalling the SAVE Act,' Rep. Brandon Gill said.

item.title: Mass Amnesty In Spain Heralds The End Of Nationhood
item.description: In Spain and across Europe, the ruling elite are turning to imperial methods of governance to erase their own people.

item.title: Not All Socialization Is Good For Your Kids
item.description: If your child spends most of his waking hours in a classroom where a large chunk of the kids are developmentally far behind, it will affect him.
